name: Celestial Door
description:
Controls:

WASD - movement

Q - throw freeze/burn potion

E - throw scrap bomb

Space - teleport

F - drink a potion

Scrollwheel - select potion/herb in inventory/crafting

I - open inventory

T - teleports on teleporter

C - open crafting menu on crafting bench

V - craft a chosen potion

Known bugs:

- In certain spots you can glitch through walls (please don't)
